entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
